moves.name: Gyro Ball
moves.effect: Its power is doubled if the target’s Speed has risen.

moves.name: X Defense All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the Defense of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Clang!
moves.effect: Activates the Critical-Hit Defense and Stat Reduction Defense effects on the allied field of play.

moves.name: Iron Tail
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of lowering the target’s Defense.

syncMove.name: Steel-Clad Iron Tail
syncMove.description: Become Mega Steelix until the end of battle. The more the user’s Defense has been raised, the greater the power of this move.

passives.name: Endurance
passives.description: If the Pokémon enters battle with full HP, allows it to endure the next hit it takes that would reduce it to 0 HP.

passives.name: Last Word
passives.description: The Pokémon uses Explosion immediately before fainting.

grid.bonus: Gyro Ball:Surging Sand 9- Powers up moves in a sandstorm.
Gyro Ball:Move Gauge Refresh 4- Has a good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
X Defense All:MP Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Iron Tail:On a Roll 1- Raises the chance of lowering stat values with the additional effects of moves.
Iron Tail:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Clang!:MP Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Clang!:Lockstep 9- Charges the move gauges of all allied sync pairs by one when a move is successful.
Clang!:Berserk Bunch 1- Raises the Attack of all allied sync pairs when a move is successful.
Sand Shelter- Protects the Pokémon from damage from a sandstorm.
Unyielding 2- When the user has endured the most recent hit and has 1 HP remaining, has a moderate chance of allowing the user to endure an additional hit that would reduce it to 0 HP.
Recuperation 2- Restores the user’s HP after using a sync move.
Rejuvenate 6- Charges the user’s move gauge by six after using a sync move.
Tough Cookie- The more the user’s Defense has been raised, the more it powers up moves.
Tough Cookie- The more the user’s Defense has been raised, the more it powers up moves.
Soothing Sand 1- Restores the Pokémon’s HP whenever it takes an action during a sandstorm.
Impatient 1- Has a small chance of reducing the user’s sync move countdown by one when the user is hit by an attack move.
